If you use this account for Mozilla apps: MA tseqdaceḍ amiḍan-agi i yisnasen d yimezla n Mozilla am AMO, Pocket, Screenshots, yessefk di tazwara ad teqqneḍ sakin ad tekkseḍ meṛṛa talɣut tudmawant yettwaskelsen. By generating new recovery codes, all pr: MA tessirweḍ-d tingalin timaynutin, akk tingalin yezrin ad uɣlent ur teddunt ara. Ḥrez-iten deg umḍiq ilaqen.
These are your one time use recovery cod: Atentan tingalin n usellek ara tesqedceḍ tikelt. Ḥrez-itent deg umḍiq ilaqen ticki ur tesɛiḍ ara anekcum ar yibenk aziraz. Tingalin ad d-ttwaseknent kan yiwet n tikelt.

Generate a recovery key to regain access: Sirew tasarutt n tririt akken ad tizmireḍ ad tkecmeḍ ɣer tecraḍ n isebtar Firefox, awalen uffiren, akked isefka yemtawin ma tettuḍ awal uffir-ik/im.

You will be unable to use your recovery: Ur tettizmireḍ ara ad tesqedceḍ tasarutt n tririt-ik/im akken ad tkecmeḍ ɣer isefka-inek/inem ma twennzeḍ awal uffir-ik/im.
Step 2 of 2: Save Recovery key: Amecwaṛ 2 ɣef 2: Sekles tasarut n tririt
